ygData.subject: How to sell an aqua lung
ygData.msgSnippet: My question is, does it matter if the aqua lung has 0 charges or 50 charges when you use it to make a rebreather? If not, here s my plan: Offer a deal to
ygData.messageBody:
My question is, does it matter if the aqua lung has 0 charges or 50 charges
when you use it to make a rebreather?

If not, here's my plan: Offer a deal to anyone that buys an aqua lung, that
when you are ready to make rebreathers, you will take their aqua lung and
only charge for the cost of the parts of the upgrade. Then gouge anyone that
wants to buy a rebreather without buying an aqua lung first. There's just a
pesky problem with failures, and how to work that out with people. But I
think it could be a workable plan.

Yilmatin
Rogue Tinkerer of Bertoxxulous


>From: sragan@...
>Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Cant seem to sell the aqua lungs =(
>Date: 9 Nov 1999 14:59:27 -0000
>
>
>Hi Folks,
>
>Well, I have been having a bitch of a time trying to sell the aqua lungs.
>With a cost of 225 to make, people just will not buy them, even for a price
>as low as 500 or 600 plat (which is a deal considering cost/failure rate).
>
>They hear 'charges' and they run away. They tell me to come back when I am
>able to make the rebreather =( Of course I may never be able to make the
>rebreather if I am never able to sell my aqua lungs.
>
>bah...
>
>FizzWizz of tunare
><< text3.html >>
